doc:
Robert Lansing (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lansing_(actor) 0 Robert Lansing (; born Robert Howell Brown, June 5, 1928 – October 23, 1994) was an American stage, film, and television actor. Lansing's motion picture roles included A Gathering of Eagles with Rock Hudson and Under the Yum Yum Tree opposite Jack Lemmon. On television, he appeared in episodes of such hits as Star Trek, Alfred Hitchcock Presents, The Twilight Zone and Murder, She Wrote. Lansing is probably best remembered as the authoritarian Brig. Gen. Frank Savage in 12 O'Clock High (1964), the television drama series about World War II bomber pilots. Robert_Lansing ( ; born Robert_Howell_Brown , June_5_,_1928 – October_23_,_1994 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor . Lansing 's_motion_picture_roles included A_Gathering of Eagles with Rock_Hudson and Under the_Yum_Yum_Tree_opposite_Jack_Lemmon . On television , he appeared in episodes of such_hits as Star_Trek , Alfred_Hitchcock Presents , The_Twilight_Zone_and_Murder , She Wrote .
